title: AI & RAG
description: Build private AI systems that understand your data. Deploy RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems that give you AI assistants trained on your own documents, knowledge base, and information.
purpose: Create private, secure AI systems that understand your specific data and knowledge. Build RAG systems that let you query your documents, get intelligent answers, and automate knowledge work without sending data to third parties.
outcomes: Save 10-20 hours per week on document research
Get instant answers from thousands of documents
Keep sensitive data private (no third-party AI)
Create custom AI solutions for your business
Reduce costs vs. API-based AI services
whatYouCanBuild: Private LLM servers (Ollama, vLLM, or cloud)
RAG systems with vector databases (Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant)
Document Q&A systems for your knowledge base
Custom AI chatbots for your business
whyNeed: You need this if you want AI that knows YOUR business, if you need private AI (no data leaves your control), if you want to query thousands of documents instantly, or if you want to automate knowledge work with AI trained on your data.
whatYouGet: Private AI server that keeps your data secure
RAG system that understands your documents
Ability to query thousands of files instantly
AI assistant trained on YOUR knowledge base
Custom AI workflows for your business
No data sent to third-party AI services
